name: Soldier of God?
description:
The nation has been invaded by demons. As a soldier, you have been ordered to kill them all. But truly, who is the real demon?  Do you know what it will cost you?

"Soldier of God?" is a first-person shooter game. The task is simple: Get rid of the demons!

If you are ready to tackle the challenge, follow these instructions:

W, A, S, D: Movement

Left click: Fire/Attack

R: Reload
Team

3D Modelling: Aran Hajiaghapour, Milad Ghanbari, Parastoo Parhizkar,
Animation: Ahmad Kalatiani, Aran Hajiaghapour, Milad Ghanbari, Parastoo Parhizkar
Audio Design: Anca Ratiu
Character Design: Parastoo Parhizkar
Level Design: Ahmad Kalatiani, Milad Ghanbari,
Production: Ahmad Kalatiani,
Programming: Ahmad Kalatiani
UI Design: Milad Ghanbari

Soundtrack

"I Walk With Ghosts" by Scott Buckley
